name: Daily Run
description: We all have a "Daily Run" in our schools and jobs, like in every race there will be obstacles and triumphs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 5 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 10 MB available space
